effect.composite_material.armor_boost.de: Increases armor value by a percentage.
effect.composite_material.corrosion.desc: Reduces armor value by a percentage.
effect.composite_material.death_curse.de: Reduces max health by a percentage.
effect.composite_material.primitive_stre: Increases attack damage by a percentage.
effect.composite_material.strong_will.de: Gives Immunity to Darkness, Blindness and Nausea.
message.composite_material.lacerator: Time: %fs Extra Damage: %f Arrow Base Damage: %.2f
message.composite_material.scapegoat: A sharp arrow is shot at the target, but the target's anger is all poured out on %s
message.composite_material.vanitas_1: ยง5"You still with the vanity"
message.composite_material.vanitas_2: ยง5"our vanity cannot break the reality"
tooltip.composite_material.abyss_blade: Killing aquatic mobs will make certain aquatic items drop.
tooltip.composite_material.abyss_fang: Converted by throwing an Elder Guardian Spike near an activated Conduit.
tooltip.composite_material.allay_box: Can consume surrounding Amethyst blocks to spawn an Allay without AI.
tooltip.composite_material.allay_steel_a: Makes you immune to Fall Damage, Hunger, Poison and Wither. Each piece of equipment can make you recover health as quickly as an Allay (stackable).
With a full set equipped: Allay tools will get a larger range with no extra durability cost.
tooltip.composite_material.allay_steel_i: Converted by giving an Allay a Dungeon Steel Ingot.
tooltip.composite_material.allay_steel_n: Hold this item in the main hand and hold the enchanted item in the off-hand, right-click to clear all enchantments of the item.
tooltip.composite_material.allay_steel_t: Deal damage to all identical targets in the area.
Mine all identical blocks in the area (Maximum 64).
tooltip.composite_material.amethyst_armo: Each piece of Amethyst Armor reduces the amount of Magic damage you take.
tooltip.composite_material.amethyst_tool: Item slowly repair itself when thrown into water.
tooltip.composite_material.ancient_book:
When the book is not enchanted, right-click to absorb all the enchantments of the item in the off-hand. 
When the book is already enchanted, right-click to consume durability and release all its stored enchantments to the item in the off-hand. 
In case of a duplicate enchantment, the one with the highest level will be chosen. Enchantments can only be transferred to valid items.
tooltip.composite_material.ancient_book_: "It could not bear the burden of the magic. It needs to release it immediately......"
tooltip.composite_material.copper_tool: Will Oxidise when thrown into water.
tooltip.composite_material.creative_rein: Hold this item in the main hand and hold the enchanted item in the off-hand, right-click to upgrade all enchantments of the enchanted item that do not have a maximum level of 1 (Unlimited).
tooltip.composite_material.disc_axe: Deals multiplied damage when the target is the Warden.
tooltip.composite_material.disc_axe_2: Killing a Warden will drop a Certain Sculk item, which can be locked as an Echo Fragment with the Silk Touch enchantment.
tooltip.composite_material.disc_axe_cove: A sharp Axe which can chop off a warden's hand, to break the silence by it's whisper in ancient city.
tooltip.composite_material.disc_hoe: When tilling grass blocks, there is a chance to obtain crops and seeds, and a very small chance to obtain Sniffer Eggs. The Fortune enchantment will increase the probability (higher levels will increase the number of drops)
tooltip.composite_material.disc_mace: Has a chance of obtaining beacon payments when mining valid beacon base blocks, the Fortune enchantment will increase the chance.
tooltip.composite_material.disc_mace_1: The beacon base blocks will disappear after breaking.
tooltip.composite_material.disc_mace_2: When you kill a mob, the loot increases based on how high you fall.
tooltip.composite_material.disc_pickaxe: Has a probability of getting ores when mining stone blocks (EXCEPT ANCIENT DEBRIS), the Fortune enchantment will increase the chance.
tooltip.composite_material.disc_shovel: When digging grass blocks, there is a chance to obtain crops and seeds, and a very small chance to obtain Sniffer Eggs. The Fortune enchantment will increase the probability (higher levels will increase the number of drops).
tooltip.composite_material.disc_sword: Has a probability of making certain gold items drop when killing mobs, the Looting enchantment will increase the chance.
tooltip.composite_material.disc_sword_sp:
Piglin Brute = Netherite Scrap
Piglin = Golden Apple
Wandering Trader = Enchanted Golden Apple
Villager = Bell
Illager = Totem Of Undying
Other = Gold Ingot
tooltip.composite_material.disenchanted_: Hold this item in the main hand and hold a piece of enchanted equipment in the off-hand, right-click to transfer all the enchantments to an Enchanted Book.
tooltip.composite_material.dungeon_axe: When killing a target, heal yourself for a percentage of the target's max health.
tooltip.composite_material.dungeon_axe_1: There is a chance of obtaining a head when killing a mob, the Fortune enchantment will increase the probability.
tooltip.composite_material.dungeon_catal: It can transform the surrounding Obsidian Steel blocks into Dungeon Steel blocks, and it can also absorb the surrounding Allay to transform the Dungeon Steel blocks into Allay Steel blocks.
tooltip.composite_material.dungeon_hamme: Deals additional damage based on your fall height, while clearing your fall height.
tooltip.composite_material.dungeon_picka: Heal a fixed amount of health when attacked.
An empty spawner is dropped when a spawner is destroyed.
tooltip.composite_material.dungeon_shiel: Makes the health restored by enemies in a large area around you act on you.
tooltip.composite_material.dungeon_steel: Converted by throwing an Obsidian Steel Ingot near a Spawner, %s%s chance of success.
Hold this item in the main hand and hold the enchanted item in the off-hand, right-click to downgrade all enchantments of the enchanted item with a level greater than 1.
Hold this item in the main hand and hold the damageable item in the off-hand, it will duplicate the off-hand item by using the totem, but you will suffer lethal damage.
If you left-click an entity whose current health is less than %s%s of your current health, it will convert into a spawn egg.
tooltip.composite_material.dungeon_sword: When attacking, heals yourself for a percentage of the damage dealt.
There is a chance of obtaining a spawn egg when killing a mob, the Looting enchantment will increase the probability.
Each time a new spawn egg is obtained through the abilities desribed above, the item's attack will be increased.
tooltip.composite_material.duplichanted_: Hold this item in the main hand and hold an enchanted book in the off-hand, right-click to duplicate the enchanted book.
tooltip.composite_material.echoium_armor: Has strong knockback resistance, making you immune to Fire, Blindness, Darkness and Weakness.
Each piece of Echo Armor increases the sonic boom damage you deal.
While equipped with the full set, Wardens will no longer spawn around you.
tooltip.composite_material.echoium_ingot: A powerful high-level material, obtained through crafting.
tooltip.composite_material.echoium_nugge: Hold this item in the main hand and hold the damageable item in the off-hand, right-click to clear the repair cost of the item.
tooltip.composite_material.echoium_sword: When the player's experience level is greater than 60, the attack will be increased based on the exceeded experience level.
tooltip.composite_material.echoium_tool: Deals additional damage based on the target's armor value, and the additional damage ignores armor defense.
tooltip.composite_material.enlightened_b: Hold this item in the main hand and hold a piece of equipment in the off-hand, right-click to enchant the item based on your XP level (costs 3 XP levels, able to obtain treasure enchantments).
tooltip.composite_material.etherite_armo: Unbreakable. It has strong knockback resistance and provides additional attributes. Wearing any piece will make the piglin neutral to you.
Makes you immune to Fall Damage, Fire, Freezing, Suffocation, Thorns and all negative potion effects. Each piece of equipment can quickly restore your health (stackable, ignores Degeneration).
When equipped with the full set: You will able use Creative flying.
tooltip.composite_material.etherite_ingo: An ultimate material which has one letter less than Netherite, obtained by crafting.
tooltip.composite_material.etherite_nugg:
Hold this item in the main hand and hold the damageable item in the off-hand, right-click to completely repair the item.
If the off-hand item is in cooldown, right-click to finish the cooldown.
tooltip.composite_material.etherite_shie: Unbreakable, will not go on cooldown, immune to ranged attacks while held and with a full set of Etherite armor.
tooltip.composite_material.etherite_swor: If you kill a target, this weapon's next attack will add an amount of damage equal to the previous target's maximum health.
tooltip.composite_material.etherite_tool: Unbreakable. Deal extra damage based on target's missing Health.
tooltip.composite_material.etherite_tote: Hold this item in the main hand and hold the damageable item in the off-hand, tags the off-hand item as Unbreakable after using.
Hold this item to use it like a Totem Of Undying, it doesn't have durability, but it does have a cool down. Equip a full set of Etherite armor to reduce the cool down.
tooltip.composite_material.etherite_wand: Fires wither skulls forward when used. The speed of the wither skulls increases with time.
Having a full set of Etherite armor equipped will change the Wither Skulls into Reinforced Wither Skulls.
tooltip.composite_material.etherite_warp: Can speed up the random Tick Speed of aligned blocks.
tooltip.composite_material.evolutium: Obtained by using an Enlightened Book to enlighten the Infused Perkin when your XP level is %s or higher.
tooltip.composite_material.forbidden_boo:
Hold this item in the main hand and hold a tool or weapon in the off-hand, right-click to remove all the enchantments and add the Vanitas effect on the item.
Vanitas effect allows you to deal extra damage based on the target's max Health when you don't have any potion effects and enchantments.
tooltip.composite_material.guardian_elde: Obtained by killing an Elder Guardian, able to convert a Guardian into an Elder Guardian.
tooltip.composite_material.heart_of_the_: Throwing it near an active Conduit will convert it into a Heart of the Sea.
tooltip.composite_material.lacerator: Arrow damage depends on how long you draw the bow, longer duration increases the rate at which damage accumulates.
tooltip.composite_material.lacerator_1: The Power enchantment will multiply the final damage.
tooltip.composite_material.lava_spring: Can convert lava flowing above it into lava source blocks.
tooltip.composite_material.obsidian_armo: Has the advantages of both diamond and gold, wearing any piece will make Piglins neutral towards you.
tooltip.composite_material.obsidian_stee: A powerful basic material, obtained through crafting.
Hold this item in the main hand and hold the damageable item in the off-hand, right-click to repair %s durability of the item.
tooltip.composite_material.obsidian_wand: When used, it sprays fire forward, dealing more damage to closer targets.
If you use this item in the Nether, it will shoot fireballs instead of spraying fire.
tooltip.composite_material.primitive_arm: Each piece of Ancient Armor will reduce the direct damage you take from enemies, and you will be immune to Slowness, Nausea and Mining Fatigue as well as suffocation and Thorns.
Provides only minimal Armor value and has a huge repair penalty when enchanted.
tooltip.composite_material.primitive_nos:
When consumed, makes all effects lasting longer than 3 minutes last infinitely.
It will double the duration of each effect lasting less than 3 minutes.
tooltip.composite_material.primitive_ten: A high-level material from ancient times, obtained through crafting.
tooltip.composite_material.primitive_too: Deals additional damage based on your current health.
"It cannot bear the weight of the magic, it cannot hold any more......"
Gains a massive repair penalty when enchanted.
tooltip.composite_material.primitive_tot: Right-click to absorb all effects with infinite duration, it will continuously apply the absorbed effects while in your inventory.
While in hand you will not take damage exceeding 40% of your maximum health.
tooltip.composite_material.purifichanted:
Hold this item in the main hand and hold an enchanted item in the off-hand, right-click to clear all curse enchantments of the enchanted item.
It can also clear all curse enchantments of a piece of the armor you have equipped.
tooltip.composite_material.reinforced_bo: Hold this item in the main hand and hold the enchanted item in the off-hand, right-click to uprade all enchantments of the enchanted item that do not have a maximum level of 1 (Up to an additional %s levels on top of the maximum level).
tooltip.composite_material.rusted_copper: Greatly reduces attributes, but attacks inflict Poison.
tooltip.composite_material.scapegoat: Left-click to acquire a target. If the target is valid, the arrow will be fired in the name of the target and the target will get the aggro of any arrows shot afterwards.
tooltip.composite_material.sculk_infuser: Able to refill the Strong Will into the Sculk Shrieker above this block.
tooltip.composite_material.sepachanted_b: Hold this item in the main hand and hold an enchanted item in the off-hand, right-click to separate the first enchantment of the enchanted item.
tooltip.composite_material.shift_cover: Pressing SHIFT to get more information.
tooltip.composite_material.sonic_boom_wa: After charging, fires a piercing sonic boom forward that deals magical damage.
tooltip.composite_material.strong_will: Obtained by using a glass bottle on a natural Sculk Shrieker. Can be reused on a Sculk Shrieker.
tooltip.composite_material.vanitatium_ar: You'll immune Magic, Explosion, Projectile damage and all effects.
Each Vanitatium armor will reduce the damage you take, the damage taken depends on amount and level of enchantments and effects on enemies.
tooltip.composite_material.vanitatium_to: Unenchantable, easy to be damaged. This item will degenerate, teleport you and leave an explosion.
When you hurt by lethal damage, it will consume all durability to protect you from this damage. The durability consumption could be replaced by consume a Glowstone instead in Nether
